title: Integrated Curriculum for Improving Social Science Argumentation and Reasoning Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Students participate in field discussions and digital resource collection using personal devices (tablets/smartphones), systematically exploring social science debates through real-case analysis

learning_goals: Students can construct logical arguments by integrating scientific evidence and diverse perspectives in socioscientific debates
Learners can develop balanced argumentation strategies for complex social issues by harmonizing emotional responses with cognitive understanding
Participants can critically evaluate value-based positions by analyzing real-world controversies, such as the COVID-19 vaccine conflict
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
